name: Will you let the candle die?
name_original: Will you let the candle die?
description:
The Little Candles Night is a special Christmas celebration in Colombia, it is a night to share with your close ones, once you lit up a candle you can use it to lit every other candle in the neighborhood. Will you let the candle die?

How to play:

Move the hand to block the wind and light up other candles. Don't let the candle die!

Web:  Use right and left arrows to move the hand

Android: Rotate your phone to move the hand

A game for the Quick Play Jam
